column4: Hi. When i booted my pc something happened with my theme. Img:  http://www.dodaj.rs/f/3J/om/3p0KMi7e/screenshot-from-2012-11-.png I am using ubuntu 12.10 and Gnome Classic (No Effects).
I have an idea, just use XFCE or something
you could just delete the configuration files from /home, but be careful not to delete anything important to you
